tool_description: Identifies and classifies specific types of semantic changes by comparing usage contexts across different historical periods.

word.description: Target word for meaning shift analysis

historical_contexts.description: Contextual usage data from different time periods

period_labels.description: Time period identifiers corresponding to context data

error_messages: Mismatched data arrays: historical_contexts and period_labels must have the same length.
Insufficient temporal data: Provide contexts from at least 2 different time periods.
Invalid sensitivity threshold: Threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
No meaning shifts detected: No significant semantic changes found with current sensitivity settings.
usage: Provide contextual usage data from different periods along with corresponding time labels. Set sensitivity threshold for change detection. Returns classification of semantic shifts and their characteristics.

shift_types.description: Types of semantic changes detected (broadening, narrowing, etc.)

change_magnitude.description: Quantified degree of semantic change for each shift

shift_description.description: Detailed description of the semantic evolution
